attributes.action: Guarantee DNA shall not be collected from the public without explicit permission or a prior criminal conviction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On reading a report on police plans to collect DNA from children as young as five, I was horrified, and I, along with many other British peoples, would like to request a guarantee that our rights to privacy, as citizens of the UK, EU, and as Human Beings, shall not be violated, nor those of our children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
